itunes:title: Episode 090: Melody Jacobs (feat. Jordan Blok)
title: Episode 090: Melody Jacobs (feat. Jordan Blok)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
In Episode 90 of CEREBRO, Connor and returning guest Jordan Blok mourn for Melody Jacobs, the theatrical Threnody! Created by Fabian Nicieza and Richard Bennett, tragic Thren's mutation attunes her to death around the world, driving her dangerously insane. After a memorable arc in early 90s X-Men, she became Nate Grey's love interest in the ongoing series X-Man — until her cruel power dragged her into the darkness.

The CEREBRO character file on Threnody begins at 1:56:35.

(Content Advisory: Thren's story includes racism, ableism, body horror, traumatic pregnancy, and the murder of an infant.)

You can support CEREBRO on Patreon!



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
